reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan well-made, soft, and comfortable, with one noting it's gentle against the skin. The color receives positive feedback, and the fit is flattering, with one customer mentioning it hits at the waist of jeans. The length receives mixed reviews - while some appreciate the cropped style, others find it too short. The sizing is also mixed, with several customers noting it runs very small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect CROPPED cardigan
items.body: I love this little sweaterâ€”I bought it first in pink, then went back for the white. It may not be right for everyone, so let me break it down: 1. It runs small. Every Amazon cardigan Iâ€™ve ever bought, no matter the seller, runs small. Order a size up. Iâ€™m 5â€™4â€/134 lbs and I bought a medium. I wanted it to fit close to my body and I got what I wanted. 2. Itâ€™s short. Yes, because itâ€™s CROPPED. If you wear it with a dress, itâ€™s perfect. With jeans or a skirt, itâ€™s probably too short. 3. It has long sleeves. Not â€˜freakishlyâ€™ long, just long. I have relatively short arms ðŸ¦–and I have the sleeves folded back one turn, like a cuff. It looks normal and fine. I have dresses with long sleeves and many cropped cardis Iâ€™ve seen have 3/4 length sleeves, which are too short. 4. Colors. I can only comment on the white and the pink. The pink is really pretty. Itâ€™s warm but not too peachy. Iâ€™ve worn it with camo cargo pants and it looked very cute (albeit short ðŸ˜‰). The white is white. There are a thousand shades of white and if youâ€™re trying to coordinate with something specific, this might not be the right white. I wouldnâ€™t even call it ivory. Itâ€™s not a bright white, but itâ€™s white. 5. Wear. Iâ€™ve worn the pink one a few times and thereâ€™s no pilling under the arms. When I wash it, it will be cold/gentle/inside out/dried flat. Thatâ€™s how I take care of *all* my sweaters, and I donâ€™t anticipate any problems with these. If you throw it in with a load of jeans and then put it in the dryer, it might not fare as well. But it seems pretty well made, especially for the price, and even comes with a spare button. I havenâ€™t ruled out the possibility of getting a third color. Edit: the sweater did pill after several wears, but it cleaned up beautifully in minutes with a sweater shaver. My expensive wool sweaters pill too, so Iâ€™m not mad. Read more
items.author: Peaches

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish comfort
items.body: Soft, colorful, and stylish. I would call this a â€œmoss green.â€ Flattering for many skin types. I am 5â€™5â€, about 132 pounds, 29/30 inch waist, 34â€ bust, and the small fits me very well in the body and in sleeve and torso length. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute but small in chest area
items.body: Very nice material and looks as advertised but runs a tad small in the chest area. I purchased a medium and have a 36 C chest. It pulls/gaps at the buttons in that area if I wear it buttoned up which stinks. It fits everywhere else great. Suggest ordering a large if you have a C cup. Read more
items.author: Rebecca

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: My daughter has a cardigan similar to this one from Zara. I love that one but it is no longer available. I bought this one and I was pleasantly surprised by how comfortable and soft this one is. It is cropped but I wear high waisted pants so it works perfectly. Size small is perfect on me, it hit my shoulders and wrists exactly where it should (which is rare). The material was nice it didnâ€™t have weird shiny wrinkles or smell funny. I tried it with many different styles and colors and it worked great. Read more
items.author: Shiloh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cardigan
items.body: Soft, great fit and structure! Perfect. Came back for more colors. Really love how it sits and lays. Crop is perfect so you don't have all this extra material just hanging around. Ordered one size up for a looser foot so got a medium. Size 4/small. Waist 27, c/d bust, 5'3", 134. Like the medium for this. Wish they had even more colors as not a fan of the pastels, lights. Read more
items.author: gypsydancer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this little cardigan, perfect for work!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased a soft black sweater from and Iâ€™m thrilled with it. The arm length is perfect not too short or overly long, fitting comfortably without bunching. The fabric is incredibly soft, offering a cozy feel thatâ€™s gentle against the skin, ideal for all day wear. Itâ€™s classy and on the thicker end, perfect for the office. Would purchase in every color :) Read more
items.author: Stace

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cropped to the Tenth
items.body: Laughably short. The shortest cardigan I've ever seen. Let's just say I didn't even try it on it's that short. Guessing it would have barely covered my bosom. Also, this looked and felt like it had acrylic and sure enough it does. Acrylic pills and is a waste of money. Read more
items.author: Laura Lane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, flattering, pretty nice material
items.body: I love this sweater and always get compliments on it! The fabric is actually very soft, and the fit is cute. I'm a little worried about it holding up in the wash- but so far so good. Read more
items.author: Sunnie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Heather Coffee, Green Fern, Rose, Black, Navy Blue, Orange, Red, Orange Pink, Pink, White, Nude Khaki, Black Coffee, Light Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
